title: Downright Delicious with Yo-Yo
overview: In this fun new series, Downright Delicious with Yo-Yo, Yo-Yo is whipping up some of her favorite dishes, cocktails, desserts and more. The show features guest appearances from her family and even her "Boss" girlfriends that are moguls in fashion, beauty and business for a Boss Brunch. The greatest thing about hanging out with Yo-Yo is that you will have a great time, with great company and bomb.com food!Â  Yo-Yo is a true hostess and loves to make delicious meals for her guests. There is never a dull moment watching this hip-hop queen show off her culinary skills. Tune in and hang with Yo-Yo as she shows us how she holds it down in the kitchen.
